title: Worker Compensation Paralegal
job_overview:
Job Title: Worker Compensation Paralegal – Full-Time | Remote 

We’re Hiring!
Worker's Compensation Paralegal?We’re looking for an experienced Workers' Compensation Paralegal to manage casework from start to finish, support attorneys in litigation, and serve as a key point of contact for clients and stakeholders. This is a remote position.


???? Responsibilities:
-Oversee and manage all aspects of Workers' Compensation and Civil Litigation cases
-Maintain organized case files, including legal documents, correspondence, and evidence
-Conduct legal research on case law, statutes, and regulations
?-Draft legal documents such as complaints, motions, and discovery requests
-Ensure timely and accurate filing of legal documents
-Serve as the primary point of contact for clients
-?Provide case updates and gather information from clients and witnesses
-Support the discovery process by preparing interrogatories
-?Organize materials and documentation for attorneys
-Assist in trial preparation, including assembling exhibits and coordinating logistics
-Aid in settlement negotiations and analyze settlement offers
-Ensure compliance with employment laws and stay updated on legal developments
-Mentor junior paralegals, legal assistants, and support staff
-?Handle billing and other administrative responsibilities
-Identify and recommend areas for process improvement
-Commit to ongoing education and skill development in employment law
-Maintain positive relationships with clients, opposing counsel, and key stakeholders

? Requirements:
-Minimum 2 years of experience  in worker compensation law. 
-Proficient in using Merus Case Software.
-Experience bilingual.
-Strong research, writing, and organizational skills
-Proficient in legal software and case management tools
-Effective communicator with the ability to manage client relationships
-Paralegal certificate or relevant degree required

???? Work Schedule:
Monday to Friday (8am-6pm PST) 

???? Salary & Benefits:
-Stable
-Work From Home
-Competitive monthly salary
-Long-term opportunity with room for growth

???? How to Apply:
 Click the “Apply” button on this post and make sure to include the following:
        1. Your updated resume
        2. A short cover letter highlighting your relevant experience
        3. Subject line: “OLJ Application – [Your Full Name] – [Job Title]”

We look forward to finding the right fit to grow with our team. Thank you!
